descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 25 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
# Experience combat in VR like never before


With more than 10 hours of single-player campaign game time and 3 chapters each presenting a different landscape and a ton of unique enemies. You’re bound to learn how to deal with them efficiently, with everything you have at your disposal. 
[media]
[media]
Are you a battle-hardened veteran who loves swords and axes? Or a spell-weaving patron of the arcane arts? Maybe an agile rogue who mastered the way of daggers and bow & arrow? Or you prefer throwing weapons? Well, you can basically throw every weapon in Grimlord.
[media]
[media]
With hundreds of weapon customizations, you can truly craft a unique instrument of killing you can call your own. Combine with our physics-based combat mechanics, you can perform all the weapon techniques in game. Oh, did I mention, if you’re using a claymore, you can even do mordhau.
[media]
[media]
There are more than a dozen bosses to challenge, each with their unique design and backstory. They’re not your typical damage sponges, fights with them are epic battle of wits and agility, brains and brawn.
[media]
[media]
[media]
[media]
display_long_description_unprocessed:
# Experience combat in VR like never before


With more than 10 hours of single-player campaign game time and 3 chapters each presenting a different landscape and a ton of unique enemies. You’re bound to learn how to deal with them efficiently, with everything you have at your disposal.

![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/75443251_612261381345182_5674533115764706962_n.mp4?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=vCOBWWSVXP0Q7kNvwHOY-lM&_nc_oc=Adn8GPtlmRWzR8Aq1wkjGfr3kuRsSD9ZBzhzTyZLawvz9dzX6z-aCvuI27El42Vr1WU&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=X-Du3-OJqNpGs5wTBzTWrA&oh=00_AfP8gB2yP8cqmB9lBSX0dQBIlxgxbJAkW9H_k3JwieOwpw&oe=684F2740)
Are you a battle-hardened veteran who loves swords and axes? Or a spell-weaving patron of the arcane arts? Maybe an agile rogue who mastered the way of daggers and bow & arrow? Or you prefer throwing weapons? Well, you can basically throw every weapon in Grimlord.
![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/39001714_1507974673219564_1452701867122163118_n.mp4?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=Jwg1e3AGxE4Q7kNvwHo_IWr&_nc_oc=AdnqaqPYVhp0tMv7S4Qua9yv33Ul7J619Kq_cl4ESZcOGw0rqaLZye8hN_QfQCmaOrM&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=X-Du3-OJqNpGs5wTBzTWrA&oh=00_AfOfhbhFldJQNseGr0m-qUT9-sSCp-xdbGqP9PS6_xeT9g&oe=684F15F8)
![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/75302218_2068538016921333_8411850603412514976_n.mp4?_nc_cat=103&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=C2Y68s4iCu0Q7kNvwHyIJ_V&_nc_oc=AdkYu-B_c-VEk8enqClX7duDyaQqSQjUx6ZwdVUbPEt1M-qVzCkULzsim-CnfMhCdlk&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=X-Du3-OJqNpGs5wTBzTWrA&oh=00_AfMMIZRcrkrfjIaXHTNspGT5twcON_OQckAnM3_raYVuEg&oe=684F1B64)
With hundreds of weapon customizations, you can truly craft a unique instrument of killing you can call your own. Combine with our physics-based combat mechanics, you can perform all the weapon techniques in game. Oh, did I mention, if you’re using a claymore, you can even do mordhau.
![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/39031422_997444645745145_5320263794737829877_n.mp4?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=EQyAbD8ioUUQ7kNvwGO_zCi&_nc_oc=AdmQZbRICHLmK-iQpyQ9Z3AY3LPGCqZ7Uix-6jcIlVD9fFLWks_GwpNPccjcucOZoKg&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=X-Du3-OJqNpGs5wTBzTWrA&oh=00_AfOXOometoGN6jIa53P3NKuhQLVzS2P5Ce_MR_M13P_lNA&oe=684F0B8E)
![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra3-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/38974460_463209446558128_4871644133710747525_n.mp4?_nc_cat=104&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=p9_9iJcM5GUQ7kNvwHOc0Fx&_nc_oc=AdmKu4nPlY8XCMKaQCw0uG05TjS-0D1Er1hYFqxxf8ah1BgcCYU2pGzBU_cl7LNBVE0&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-2.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=X-Du3-OJqNpGs5wTBzTWrA&oh=00_AfMAiCchYANVolxYrxsCujIWQPC7cyAF8A6EHjPiaXK0mg&oe=684EFC21)
There are more than a dozen bosses to challenge, each with their unique design and backstory. They’re not your typical damage sponges, fights with them are epic battle of wits and agility, brains and brawn.
